ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmoore and Dark elf camp in Lesser Faydark
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A scene from the Temple room in Dalnir: (after a heavy fight) Magician: WhhooooHhooooo!  We rule!  Ain t my AOE spell Purty? Enchanter: Very nice -- except
ygData.messageBody:
--- Melaniel <online.games@...> wrote:
>
>every time I've
> joined a group with one, it appears to me as if they
> are soloing while
> only notionally grouping (if that makes sense).

A scene from the Temple room in Dalnir:

(after a heavy fight)
Magician: WhhooooHhooooo! We rule! Ain't my AOE
spell Purty?
Enchanter: Very nice -- except it cancels out my mezz
spells.
Magician: Then don't use Mezz.
Bard: But (name deleted) the AOE mezz is a crowd
control spell that keeps us alive...
Magician: I AM CROWD CONTROL!

sheesh
